parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature Failure of Front Wheel Hubs
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature failure of front wheel hubs can cause vibration, noise, and loss of control while driving, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Vibration while driving
noise from the front wheels
loose or wobbly wheels
difficulty steering.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature Failure of Upper and Lower Ball Joints
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature failure of upper and lower ball joints can cause loss of control while driving, uneven tire wear, and vibration, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Clunking or creaking noise from the front suspension
uneven tire wear
vibration while driving
loose or wobbly steering.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission shifter assembly can cause the vehicle to malfunction, leading to difficulties in shifting gears, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle has difficulty shifting into gear
the shifter feels loose
the vehicle will not start when put in park
the vehicle shifts into gear on its own
the doors lock and unlock randomly
the windows roll up and down on their own
the windshield wipers change their sequence
and the rearview mirror rotates without any outside action.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the electrical system can cause various components to fail, leading to unpredictable behavior, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The doors lock and unlock randomly
the windows roll up and down on their own
the windshield wipers change their sequence
and the rearview mirror rotates without any outside action.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The repeated failure of the heater core can cause loss of heat and air, leading to discomfort and potential safety issues, especially in extreme weather conditions. It can also lead to coolant leaks, which can cause engine damage and overheating.
symptoms: No heat or air
coolant gushes out of the car when the heater or air conditioner is turned on
repeated failure of the heater core
corrosion or damage to the heater core.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The alleged ionic problem can cause electrical current to flow through the motor, leading to premature wear and failure of components such as the heater core, ball joints, and engine mounts, which can result in safety issues and costly repairs.
symptoms: Repeated failure of components such as the heater core
ball joints
and engine mounts
corrosion or damage to these components
electrical issues or malfunctions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the upper and lower ball joints can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Loose or worn-out ball joints
clunking or rattling noises from the front suspension
uneven tire wear
difficulty steering or controlling the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine mounts can cause engine damage, coolant leaks, and loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Engine noise or vibration
coolant leaks
engine damage or failure
difficulty controlling the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Oil Leak due to Faulty Seals
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The oil leak can cause engine damage, leading to costly repairs, and potentially cause the engine to fail, resulting in a loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Oil leak visible under the vehicle
oil droplets or stains on the ground
low oil pressure warning light
engine noise or knocking sounds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the door bushings can cause the doors to malfunction, leading to difficulties in opening or closing, and potentially causing safety issues, such as trapping occupants or obstructing emergency exits.
symptoms: Doors difficult to open or close
doors sagging or drooping
creaking or grinding sounds when opening or closing doors.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Exorbitant Cost of Xenon Headlamp Replacement
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The high cost of replacing xenon headlamps can lead to compromised safety on the road, as customers may opt to drive with only one functioning headlamp or use high beams instead, reducing visibility and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: None
as this issue is related to the cost and availability of replacement parts rather than a specific malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lack of Affordable Alternative Headlamp Replacement Options
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of affordable alternative headlamp replacement options can lead to compromised safety on the road, as customers may opt to drive with only one functioning headlamp or use high beams instead, reducing visibility and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: None
as this issue is related to the availability and pricing of replacement parts rather than a specific malfunction.
